website_summaries.verdict: Owners seem to be in near disbelief that a tire of such quality is available at such a reasonable price.
pros: Performs especially well during sudden maneuvers such as sharp turns, making owners feel as though they are riding on performance tires
cons: Does not have a treadlife warranty

customer_reviews.title: These are really great tires. When I bought the car new
customer_reviews.text: These are really great tires. When I bought the car new, this is what came on them. This is my third set of these.

customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery runs good great mileage that's why I reordered the exact same for my Honda civic.

customer_reviews.title: smooth riding and look nice. I was concerned about buying tires online but ...
customer_reviews.text: Tires are very quiet, smooth riding and look nice. I was concerned about buying tires online but they are nice and arrived quickly. And the price was great.

customer_reviews.title: Real good tires
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of four tires for my Mazda 3. They are great in performance, I feel solid and confident when I make sharp turn. However, the tires are not as quiet as I hoped for. That is why I give it four stars.

customer_reviews.text: My husband said price and free shipping was too good to be true for these tires.. He was wrong, they came fast, exactly what we needed, look great, I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gillard

customer_reviews.title: Slight nick on inside of tire - size of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Slight nick on inside of tire - size of a quarter. Shipped to front door. $10 mounting and balancing at local store. 7000 miles on tire and performing perfectly. Have not had to add any air - I WILL PURCHASE AGAIN AND AGAIN. I was sold original tires (Walmart) on sale for a killer deal, did not get warranty; when damaged beyond repair - they said replacement price was double - - then I discovered this product. The supplier listed above must recycle these tire from wrecked - totaled vehicles. I WILL NEVER PURCHASE NEW TIRES AGAIN !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arlington, TN

customer_reviews.title: Tires are not shape correctly
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these tires ... I had brought these tires and went to a tire shop to get them mounted and they told me to return the tires that they were no good these tires are gonna bounce that the wheels are not shaped correctly... No way I need that . I have a 2015 subrau impreza with only 17 thousand miles on the car and trying to get the easy way out and buy tires that are cheap this is what happens to me
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Cuebas

customer_reviews.title: Best Price and Rapid shipping
customer_reviews.text: Could not believe the price and tire was at my door in three days! Would easily buy fom this supplier again!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tires rain or shine
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tires rain or shine, I live in Dallas and the roads are not the best, so these tires take a beating but still a great ride I highly recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: great tires at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying tires thru Amazon but am glad I did. Better price than local tire shops. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DSB

customer_reviews.title: great tires for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I've been getting these tires for a while now. I think I'm on my forth set and I love them. The last about 35k miles which is great for the price. I paid $75 each and shipping was pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: andddy

customer_reviews.title: Quality from the get go!
customer_reviews.text: These are a smooth ride andtheytrack really well. I have a tire machine at home and installed these with no wheel weights then drove it on the freeway at 70mph plus with no shake whatsoever. That's the sign of great quality in a tire and I have installed many that take a ton of weights to balance. Next time you buy a cheap on sale brand take note the amount of weight it takes to balance them. P.S.: I have had them balanced since the installation and don't at all recommend not balancing tires.
customer_reviews.author: C. Laidlaw

customer_reviews.title: They were shipped nearly in 24 hours which was awesome. But I had them for about 8 months ...
customer_reviews.text: They were shipped nearly in 24 hours which was awesome. But I had them for about 8 months and had to replace them :/ Two of them the belts came through!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The condition appears as described and the prices are competitive.

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth ride and great traction so far
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth ride and great traction so far. However, i feel like my gas mileage is dropped a little bit.

customer_reviews.text: They did not have any defects and shipping was surprisingly fast.

product_meta.title: Goodyear Eagle LS Radial Tire - 205/55R16 89T
product_meta.description: Get all-season and a smooth, quiet ride with the Goodyear Eagle LS all-season tire. Four circumferential grooves help evacuate water for enhanced wet traction. A special tread block sequence helps enhance handling and traction and reduces tread noise. A rim protector helps protect wheels against accidental curb damage and scrapes. Premium sidewall styling offers a contemporary appearance.
feature_bullets: Four circumferential grooves for increased wet traction
Special tread block sequence enhances handling and traction and reduces tread noise
Premium sidewall styling offers a contemporary appearance
Reliable traction in multiple driving conditions for year-round performance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars68 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
